attributes.action: Investigate the falsely reported positives of leaving the European Union
attributes.additional_details: This petition is being made to get the government to  investigate the falsely reported claims of leaving the European Union, report there findings to the public and if foul play is found revoke article 50 immediately as democracy was not carried out in and ethical or legal manner. The people voted on lies and deceit and that's no democracy!
attributes.background: There had been facts state during the referendum that were proven as false at a later time, for example, £350 million per week for the NHS if we leave. The deceitful nature of how the referendum was conducted is not being contested and the government is not willing to look at these factors

rejection.details:
There are already petitions calling for inquiries into Brexit and the EU referendum campaign.

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/245297

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/242385
